Title: Good Luck, Father Ted
Plot:
Ted gets his chance to be on television when he is to be interviewed by a magazine programme. 


'FunLand', the most pathetic travelling fair ever invented has come to Craggy Island, and while Ted is distracted with Father Jack, Dougal seizes his moment of glory.
GuestStars: Patrick Drury, Rynagh O'Grady, Gerard Lee, Pat Shortt, Noelle Brown, Mark Murray
